scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=admin
scripts.prisma:migrate: dotenv -e server/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:seed: dotenv -e server/.env -- npx prisma db seed --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: dotenv -e server/.env -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
